description: Balsam Fir (Abies balsamea 'Jamy') is an amazing plant species. It is a fast-growing evergreen tree found throughout North America, and it is a great addition to many types of landscapes. It has unique dark-green needles with a pleasant scent and it provides excellent foliage throughout the entire year. It’s also highly adaptable and able to survive in extreme temperatures, providing great value to colder climates. Plus, its ornamental cones, admired for its bright coloring, adds to its charm and beauty. It’s a reliable option for the many landscapes and offers superior performance.
